mese swaminwahanse wana ma eeka kiya ishtakala bawa numbaala danagannahuyayi swaminwahanse kiyanasekayi mata kiya. 15 nawatha swaminwahansege wachanaya ma wethata pamina kiyanuye: manushya puthraya, 16 numbaa eka liyak ragena-yudatath ohuge samagamkarayan wana ishrayel puthrantathya kiya eeka pita liya, thawa liyak ragena-yosepta ayithi eprayimgeda ohuge samagamkarayan wana mulu ishrayel wanshayeda liyaya kiya eeka pita liya, 17 eewa numbae athe ekak wena pinisa eka liyak kota ekinekata lankaraganna. 18 numbae senangage puthrayan numbaata kathakota: mewayin numbaa hangawanne kimekda kiya numbaa apata nodanwannehidayi numbaen asuwama, 19 numbaa owunta kathakota: swamiwu dewiyanwahanse mese kiyanaseka-menna, eprayimge athe thibena yosepge liyada ohuge samagamkarayan wana ishrayel gothrada ma wisin ragena, eewa eekata, enam yudage liyata thaba, eewa mage athe ekak wena lesa eewa eka liyak karannemiyi kiyanna. 20 numbaa wisin liwimak karana li owun idiriyehi numbae athe thibeddi: 21 swamiwu dewiyanwahanse mese kiyanasekayi owunta kiyanna.
